    • Method Detail

      • getAutoPostSocialNetworks

        public static SocialNetwork[] getAutoPostSocialNetworks(Context context)
                                                 throws SocializeException
        Gets the Social Networks the user has elected to auto-post to.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        Returns:
        An array of SocialNetworks, or null if the user has not elected to auto post to any.
        Throws:
        SocializeException

      • getCurrentUser

        public static User getCurrentUser(Context context)
                           throws SocializeException
        Returns the current logged in user. If no user is currently authenticated this will authenticate synchronously.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        Returns:
        The current logged in user
        Throws:
        SocializeException

      • getCurrentUserAsync

        public static void getCurrentUserAsync(Context context,
                       UserGetListener listener)
        Returns the current logged in user. If no user is currently authenticated this will authenticate asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        listener - A listener to handle the result.

      • saveUserAsync

        public static void saveUserAsync(Context context,
                 User user,
                 UserSaveListener listener)
        Saves the given user.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        user - The user to be saved.
        listener - A listener to handle the result.

      • clearLocalSessionData

        public static void clearLocalSessionData(Context context)
        Clears the saved session state for the user. WARNING: This will wipe any locally saved preferences for this user.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
